description: This file is a shell script (edfAnalyzer.sh) used for analyzing unreferenced code and data in object files and libraries for a Linux host environment. It performs symbol extraction, comparison, validation, and reporting related to ELF executables and libraries, with functions for building symbol tables, validating symbol consistency, and generating various usage reports.

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Displays help information about the script usage

methods.name: oddsBuilder
methods.description: Builds a symbol table file from an ELF object file using objdump

methods.name: odusBuilder
methods.description: Builds a list of undefined symbols from an ELF object file

methods.name: odsa2ods
methods.description: Converts odsa format to ods format

methods.name: flcomplval
methods.description: Validates if two file lists are complements based on a specified column

methods.name: odstotal
methods.description: Calculates metrics for an ods file (e.g., size and count of different symbol types)

methods.name: odstotalRead
methods.description: Reads back total metrics from an ods file into variables

methods.name: odsRead
methods.description: Reads a line of ods data and extracts size information

methods.name: odsrns
methods.description: Sorts the ods used/unused files numerically in reverse order

methods.name: odsvalidate
methods.description: Validates ods total, used, and unused files for consistency
